title: Bug 124610 - Adding a filter on a boolean computed column causes an error
description: When attempting to apply a filter to a boolean computed column in the software, it results in an error. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
OB: When attempting to apply a filter to a boolean computed column in the software, it results in an error.
EB: I expect that applying a filter to a boolean computed column should not cause an error. The software should handle this operation gracefully without any unexpected errors.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the section where you can create or edit a filter.
3. Add a filter condition to a boolean computed column.
4. Save the filter or apply it.
5. Observe the error that occurs during this process.
